messages.subject: Japanese Swords, Weaponry & Dai-Token-Ichi Tour
messages.msgSnippet: To All, For anyone who is serious about appreciating and studying Japanese swords, fittings and weaponry, going to Japan and visiting some of the finest
messages.messageBody:
To All,

For anyone who is serious about appreciating and studying Japanese swords,
fittings and weaponry, going to Japan and visiting some of the finest
museums, castles, sword stores and the annual Dai-Token-Ichi are an absolute
MUST. Attached is the itinerary for the upcoming tour from October 16th to
October 27th. It is only 5 months from now so now is a good time to do some
advance planning. All things considered, the cost of the trip is a modest
investment as you will learn, see and experience so much. If you confine
yourselves to sword shows and museums in the USA, you will NEVER advance
your knowledge. I organize and conduct the one and only comprehensive and
focused Japanese swords, fittings and weaponry tour.
Thanks for reading,

Fred
SwordSmith Secrets
Email: swordsmithsecret@...
